title: Free Webcast: Direct Marketing News to Host Xanterra Parks & Resorts and RedPoint Global to Share the Journey to One-to-One Excellence
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: RedPoint Global Inc. 
WELLESLEY HILLS, MA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/11/15 -- RedPoint Global, a leading provider of data management and digital marketing software, will join Xanterra Parks & Resorts for an in-depth webcast hosted by Direct Marketing News to discuss how Xanterra's corporate marketing team helped build a more cohesive and connected approach to customer engagement. 
Attendees will learn in detail how Xanterra worked with RedPoint Global to move from siloed data and disconnected marketing campaigns to providing unique and personalized communications and interactions with guests at Xanterra Parks & Resorts. 
WHEN: Tuesday, September 15, 2015, 1:00PM EDT/10:00AM PDT WHO: Andrew Heltzel , Director of Marketing & CRM, Xanterra Parks & Resorts Michael Johnston , CRM Campaign Manager, Xanterra Parks & Resorts Anne Miller , CRM Data Analyst, Xanterra Parks & Resorts Buck Webb , Senior Solutions Engineer, RedPoint Global WHY: Attendees will learn how Xanterra worked with RedPoint Global and used customer data to revamp their marketing strategy, leading to more personalized engagement with their guests. HOW: Marketers can register for this free Direct Marketing News webinar at: https://engage.vevent.com/index.jsp?eid=2691&seid=762&code=WP 
About RedPoint Global Inc. RedPoint Global empowers marketers to bring together all the customer data they need to create precise one-to-one interactions with customers across any and all marketing channels. Unlike other solutions, the RedPoint Convergent Marketing Platform, a customer engagement platform, enables users to quickly extract structured and unstructured data from wherever it is, easily analyze customer behaviors and preferences, and create precisely the right messaging -- whenever and through whatever channel required -- all from a single platform. No other software provider offers an all-in-one solution PLUS speed-to-market and robust scalability. For more information please visit http://www.redpoint.net or email contact.us@redpoint.net .
